mapper.select: select template.temp_id,template.temp_name,template.temp_desc,template.temp_reserve1,template.temp_reserve2,template.temp_reserve3, design.username,type.type_name from t_template template,t_user design,t_house_type type where template.type_id=type.type_id and design.id=template.designer_id

select template.temp_id,template.temp_name,template.temp_desc,template.solu_id,template.temp_reserve1,template.temp_reserve2,template.temp_reserve3, design.username,type.type_name, solution.solu_id,solution.solu_name,solution.designer_id,solution.state,solution.add_time,solution.solu_desc,solution.share_sign, room.room_id,room.room_name,room.room_desc, pn.product_id,pn.pn_num,pn.pn_id, product.product_id,product.product_name, picture.picture_id,picture.picture_link,picture.picture_name from t_template template left join t_house_type type on template.temp_id=type.type_id left join t_user design on design.id=template.designer_id left join t_solutions solution on template.designer_id=solution.designer_id left join t_room room on room.solu_id=solution.solu_id left join t_product_num pn on room.room_id = pn.room_id left join t_product product on pn.product_id = product.product_id left join t_picture picture on product.product_id = picture.product_id where template.temp_id=#{tempId}
mapper.insert: insert into t_template(temp_name, temp_desc, type_id, solu_id, designer_id, temp_reserve1, temp_reserve2, temp_reserve3) VALUES (#{template.tempName},#{template.tempDesc},#{typeId},#{template.solutions.soluId},#{designId},#{template.tempReserve1},#{template.tempReserve2},#{template.tempReserve3})
